meanings.definition: The plant life of a particular region or period.
meanings.sent1: The florae in the forest varied greatly in color and size.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the florae of different ecosystems to understand their biodiversity.
meanings.sent3: The florae at the botanical garden threw a party for the bees.
meanings.sent4: The florae of the desert whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The florae of the meadow danced gracefully in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plants of a particular region or period.
meanings.sent1: Local farmers take pride in cultivating the florae of the area.
meanings.sent2: The florae in the museum exhibit were carefully labeled and displayed.
meanings.sent3: The florae in the backyard decided to have a race to see who was the tallest.
meanings.sent4: The florae of the ancient ruins stood as silent witnesses to history.
meanings.sent5: The florae along the riverbank swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The collective plant life of a region.
meanings.sent1: The florae of the rainforest provide homes for many animals.
meanings.sent2: Tourists marveled at the diverse florae of the tropical island.
meanings.sent3: The florae in the park organized a talent show for charity.
meanings.sent4: The florae of the garden bloomed like a colorful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The florae of the mountain slope painted a beautiful landscape.
